mapper.select: SELECT p.`id`, p.`title`, p.`time_limit`, p.`memory_limit`, p.`stack_limit`, p.`description`, p.`input`, p.`output`, p.`examples`, p.`difficulty`, p.`hint`, t.`language`, t.`code` FROM `edu_program_homework_problem` p LEFT JOIN (SELECT `problem_id`,`code`, `language` FROM `edu_program_homework_stu_judge` WHERE `stu_id` = #{stuId} AND `problem_id` = #{problemId} ORDER BY `create_time` DESC LIMIT 1) t ON p.`id` = t.`problem_id` WHERE p.`id` = #{problemId}
